INSERT INTO PLACE VALUES('P'||SEQ_PLACENO.NEXTVAL,#{memberNo},#{title},#{explanation},DEFAULT,#{category},#{position,typeHandler=strArr},DEFAULT)
SELECT 'P'||SEQ_PLACENO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PLACEIMG JOIN PLACE USING(PLACENO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBERNO) WHERE PLACENO=#{placeNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PLACECOMMENT WHERE PLACENO=#{placeNo} AND STATUS='E'

SELECT PLACECOMMENTNO,COMMENTLEVEL,IMG,NICKNAME,PLACECOMMENT,WRITEDATE,MEMBERNO,STATUS FROM PLACECOMMENT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBERNO) WHERE PLACENO=#{placeNo} START WITH COMMENTLEVEL=1 CONNECT BY PRIOR PLACECOMMENTNO=COMMENTREF ORDER SIBLINGS BY WRITEDATE DESC
select * from member join place using(memberNo) join placeImg using(placeNo) where memberNo=#{memberNo} and type ='M'
select count(*) from member join place using(memberNo) where memberNo = #{memberNo}

SELECT PLACENO,TITLE,EXPLANATION,POSITION,PLACEDATE,STATUS,FILENAME,COUNT(HEARTMEMBERNO) AS HEARTCOUNT FROM PLACE LEFT JOIN PLACELIKE USING(PLACENO) LEFT JOIN PLACEIMG USING(PLACENO) WHERE FLOOR(SYSDATE-PLACEDATE)<14 AND TYPE='M' AND STATUS='Y' GROUP BY (PLACENO,TITLE,EXPLANATION,POSITION,PLACEDATE,TYPE,STATUS,FILENAME) ORDER BY HEARTCOUNT DESC, PLACEDATE DESC

SELECT MEMBERNO,PLACENO,TITLE,EXPLANATION,CATEGORY,POSITION,FILENAME,NICKNAME,IMG,HASHCONTENT,STATUS FROM PLACE LEFT JOIN PLACEIMG USING(PLACENO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBERNO) LEFT JOIN HASHTAG ON POSTNO=PLACENO WHERE HASHCONTENT=#{value} AND TYPE='M' AND STATUS='Y' ORDER BY PLACEDATE DESC
select * from placelike where placeno=#{placeNo} and heartmemberno=#{memberNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PLACELIKE WHERE PLACENO=#{no} AND HEARTMEMBERNO=#{memberNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member join place using(memberNo) where memberNo = #{memberNo} AND STATUS='Y'
SELECT PLACENO,COUNT(*) AS CNT from PLACELIKE group by PLACENO
mapper.update: UPDATE PLACECOMMENT SET STATUS='D' WHERE PLACECOMMENTNO=#{placeCommentNo} AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PLACECOMMENT WHERE COMMENTREF=#{placeCommentNo})>0
